message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I believe is worth a lot to you. I'm willing to let it go for $13,000. This is a great deal, as it's worth at least $12,000 to you, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can't justify spending $13,000 on this product. Given its value to me is around $12,000, I would like to propose a price of $12,000 to purchase it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
